attributes.action: Rethink the purposed Cash Hand out of £200 to Expentant Mothers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We beleive that the above amounts to an ill thought out plan and indeed encourages Pregancy amount women who have not properly understood or prepared for the financial strain that having a child causes

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
